price: ߒ ߘߌߣߊ߬ ߔߊߦߌߔߊߦߌ ߟߝߊ߫ ߌ ߣߴߌ ߟߊߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߞߐߘߍ߫
arabic: لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿīna
